title: Courgetti bolognese
ingredients: ['450g beef mince', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '425g tomato pasta sauce', '1 (400g) tin whole peeled tomatoes', '1 tablespoon salt, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/2 teaspoon onion powder', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/4 teaspoon red chilli flakes', '170g tomato puree', '3 courgettes, julienned']
